title: 2018台灣國際蘭展活動預告
content: 2018臺灣國際蘭展Taiwan International Orchid Show 2018【內覽會】3/2 (週五) 10:00-18:00【開放時間】3/3 (週六)－3/12(週一) 09:00-18:00 3/12(週一) 16:00閉展【展覽地點】臺灣蘭花生物科技園區臺南市後壁區烏樹里烏樹林325號【指導單位】行政院農業委員會農糧署/經濟部國際貿易局【主辦單位】臺南市政府/中華民國對外貿易發展協會【新聞聯絡人】臺南市政府農業局  吳俊傑科長 /楊子儀 連絡電話：06-6355862 E-mail：yangtzuyi@mail.tainan.gov.twTaiwan International Orchid Show 2018【Preview】 10:00-18:00 on March 2nd (Fri.)【Daily Open Hours 】09:00-18:00 during March 3rd (Sat.) and 12th (Mon.)Closed at 16:00 on March 12th (Mon.)【Location】Taiwan Orchid Plantation No. 325, Wushulin, Houbi Dist., Tainan City 731, Taiwan (R.O.C.)【Supervisor】 Agriculture and Food Agency, Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan Bureau of Foreign Trade, MOEA【Organizer】Tainan City Government/Taiwan External Trade Development Council 【Contact us】Bureau of Agriculture, Tainan City Government Ms. Yang, E-mail to: yangtzuyi@mail.tainan.gov.tw
